full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I GZUNGS DANG YIG DRUG SMYUNG GNAS KYI PHAN YON MDOR BSDUS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I GZUNGS DANG YI GE DRUG SMYUNG GNAS KYI PHAN YON MDOR BSDUS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS CHU BZANG RI KHROD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O, ,
